hero.role: Senior Physician | JKU University Hospital Linz
hero.title: Dr. Romana Wass, PhD
hero.sub: Specialist in Pulmonology with a focus on Oncology. Individual high-end medicine meets academic excellence at JKU University Hospital Linz.

expertise.title: Core Areas
expertise.card1_desc: Interdisciplinary treatment of malignant lung diseases and thoracic tumors.
expertise.card2_desc: Individualized therapies through molecular biological diagnostics and immuno-oncology.
expertise.card3_desc: Investigation of unclear pulmonary findings using state-of-the-art imaging and screening.
expertise.card4_desc: Scientific consulting for pharmaceutical expert committees and advisory boards.

about.quote: "Scientific progress is only valuable when it reaches the patient directly."
about.p1: As a senior physician at JKU University Hospital Linz, I combine clinical excellence with academic research. My focus is on optimizing oncological treatment pathways.
about.p2: My goal is to obtain my habilitation to set new standards in pulmonary teaching and research.

science.title: Science
science.sub: Ongoing research projects and international publications to optimize patient care.
science.hab_desc: Development of molecular markers to predict therapeutic response to immunotherapies in advanced NSCLC.

advisory.title: Scientific Advisory & Lectures
advisory.desc: Dr. Romana Wass provides scientific expertise for pharmaceutical companies (Advisory Boards, Lectures). The goal is to exchange knowledge between research and practice. This activity serves scientific discourse and does not constitute product advertising.

media.title: Media & Presentations
media.sub: Insights into congresses, podcasts, and scientific public contributions.
